title: 18 key terms you need to understand for Sociology (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this episode, Matthew defines 18 key terms that you need to know for studying Sociology from norms, values and roles to anticipatory socialisation, sanctions and social construction. These terms are the basic terms that Sociologists use all the time in their writing and theories. Enjoy.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
